mapper.select: select sub_category.sub_category_name, main_category.main_category_name FROM sub_category, main_category WHERE sub_category_id = #{subcategory_id} AND sub_category.main_category_id = main_category.main_category_id;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM challenge , sub_category, main_category WHERE 1=1 and challenge.subcategory_id = sub_category.sub_category_id AND sub_category.main_category_id = main_category.main_category_id and subcategory_id = #{sub_category_id}
AND main_category_name = "취미" AND main_category_name = "자기계발"
and challenge_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND challenge_type = "무료" AND challenge_type = "유료"
AND startdate > NOW()

SELECT challenge.challenge_id, challenge_name, thumbnail, startdate, enddate, createdate, challenge.member_id, subcategory_id, challenge_type, count, sub_category_name from challenge, sub_category, (SELECT challenge.challenge_id, COUNT(*) as count from challenge, challenge_join WHERE challenge.challenge_id = challenge_join.challenge_id GROUP BY challenge.challenge_id) count_table WHERE challenge.subcategory_id = sub_category.sub_category_id AND challenge.challenge_id = count_table.challenge_id AND enddate >= NOW() GROUP BY challenge.challenge_id order by COUNT desc, challenge.createdate desc LIMIT 8;

SELECT challenge.challenge_id, challenge_name, thumbnail, startdate, enddate, createdate, challenge.member_id, subcategory_id, challenge_type, count, sub_category_name from challenge, sub_category, (SELECT challenge.challenge_id, COUNT(*) as count from challenge, challenge_join WHERE challenge.challenge_id = challenge_join.challenge_id GROUP BY challenge.challenge_id) count_table WHERE challenge.subcategory_id = sub_category.sub_category_id AND challenge.challenge_id = count_table.challenge_id and challenge_type = "유료" AND enddate >= NOW() GROUP BY challenge.challenge_id order by challenge.createdate desc LIMIT 6;
mapper.update: update challenge set challenge_name=IFNULL(#{challenge_name},challenge_name), thumbnail=IFNULL(#{thumbnail},thumbnail), startdate=IFNULL(#{startdate},startdate), enddate=IFNULL(#{enddate},enddate), description=IFNULL(#{description},description), challenge_type=IFNULL(#{challenge_type},challenge_type), challenge_cost=IFNULL(#{challenge_cost},challenge_cost), limit_member=IFNULL(#{limit_member},limit_member) where challenge_id=#{challenge_id} and member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.delete: delete from challenge where challenge_id=#{challenge_id} and member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.select: SELECT *,COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM challenge a, challenge_join b WHERE b.challenge_id=#{challenge_id} AND a.challenge_id=b.challenge_id GROUP BY a.challenge_id
